dcterms:creator: L. Mesin
J. Ersching
G. D. Victora
dcterms:description: This dataset provides insights into the dynamics of B cells within germinal centers, focusing on their behavior and interactions during the immune response.
dcterms:title: Germinal Center Dynamics

dcterms:creator: H. N. Eisen
dcterms:description: This dataset discusses the process of affinity enhancement in antibodies, detailing how low-affinity antibodies are succeeded by high-affinity antibodies during immune responses.
dcterms:title: Aﬃnity Enhancement of Antibodies

dcterms:creator: G. D. Victora
L. Mesin
dcterms:description: This dataset explores the clonal and cellular dynamics within germinal centers, providing insights into how B cells proliferate and differentiate.
dcterms:title: Clonal and Cellular Dynamics in Germinal Centers

dcterms:creator: J. M. Tas
L. Mesin
G. Pasqual
S. Targ
J. T. Jacobsen
Y. M. Mano
C. S. Chen
J.-C. Weill
C.-A. Reynaud
E. P. Browne
dcterms:description: This dataset provides a visualization of antibody affinity maturation processes occurring in germinal centers, illustrating how B cells evolve their affinity for antigens.
dcterms:title: Visualizing Antibody Aﬃnity Maturation

dcterms:creator: K. Eyer
C. Castrillon
G. Chenon
J. Bibette
P. Bruhns
A. D. Griﬃths
J. Baudry
dcterms:description: This dataset quantitatively assesses the secreted IgG repertoire following immunization, providing insights into the quality of immune responses.
dcterms:title: The Quantitative Assessment of the Secreted IgG Repertoire

dcterms:creator: N. S. De Silva
U. Klein
dcterms:description: This dataset examines the dynamics of B cells within germinal centers, focusing on their proliferation and selection processes.
dcterms:title: Dynamics of B Cells in Germinal Centers

dcterms:creator: R. K. Abbott
S. Crotty
dcterms:description: This dataset discusses the factors influencing B cell competition and immunodominance during immune responses.
dcterms:title: Factors in B Cell Competition and Immunodominance

dcterms:creator: J. Zhang
E. I. Shakhnovich
dcterms:description: This dataset explores the role of population bottlenecks in the affinity maturation process of B cells, providing insights into optimal mutation and selection strategies.
dcterms:title: The Role of Population Bottleneck in Affinity Maturation
